display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index: (All apneas with no oxygen desaturation threshold used, hypopneas with 30%-50% flow reduction and with >= 4% oxygen desaturation, and hypopneas with > 50% flow reduction with >= 3% oxygen desaturation) / hour of estimated sleep from type III home sleep apnea test
description:
Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events.

Estimated sleep duration, providing an approximation of total sleep duration (i.e. total sleep time) inferred from analysis of non-EEG channels [Zhao et al., 2017 (PMID:27707441)]( https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5181603/)
